Class OZDWWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • OZDWWidget
  • public class OZDWWidget
extends greenfoot.Actor
    OZDWWidget is a Greenfoot Actor that displays values, such as health of a character of charge of an ability. It is essentially a stat bar. There are two types of OZDWWidget. One is a circular bar that displays a percentage value in the middle as well as some ticks to represent the percentage. The other is a rectangular bar that can is intended to be used as an HP/shield bar, but can be used for other purposes if desired.
    Version:
    March 11, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei & Owen Zhu

    • Constructor Detail

      • OZDWWidget

        public OZDWWidget()
        Creates a generic OZDWWidget with default dimensions and values.

      • OZDWWidget

        public OZDWWidget​(int width,
                  int height,
                  int borderWidth,
                  int hpVal,
                  int maxHpVal,
                  int chargeVal,
                  int maxChargeVal)
        Creates an OZDWWidget of the dimensions specified and with the values specified.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the rectangular bar portion of the widget.
        height - Height of the rectangular bar portion of the widget (diameter of the circular bar will be twice this height).
        borderWidth - Width of the border surrounding the rectangular bar portion of the widget.
        hpVal - Initial/starting value for the rectangular bar.
        maxHpVal - Maximum possible value for the rectangular bar.
        chargeVal - Initial/starting value for the circular bar.
        maxChargeVal - Maximum possible value for the circular bar.

      • OZDWWidget

        public OZDWWidget​(int width,
                  int height,
                  int borderWidth,
                  int hpVal,
                  int maxHpVal,
                  int chargeVal,
                  int maxChargeVal,
                  greenfoot.Color filledColor,
                  greenfoot.Color emptyColor,
                  greenfoot.Color borderColor,
                  greenfoot.Color updateDownColor,
                  greenfoot.Color updateUpColor)
        Creates an OZDWWidget with the dimensions and values specified. Colors are also specified but only apply to the rectangular bar portion.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the rectangular bar portion of the widget.
        height - Height of the rectangular bar portion of the widget (diameter of the circular bar will be twice this height).
        borderWidth - Width of the border surrounding the rectangular bar portion of the widget.
        hpVal - Initial/starting value for the rectangular bar.
        maxHpVal - Maximum possible value for the rectangular bar.
        chargeVal - Initial/starting value for the circular bar.
        maxChargeVal - Maximum possible value for the circular bar.
        filledColor - Colour for the filled up portion of the rectangular bar.
        emptyColor - Colour for the empty portion of the rectangular bar.
        borderColor - Colour for the border surrounding the rectangular bar.
        updateDownColor - Colour for the value update animation for decreases in the rectangular bar's value.
        updateUpColor - Colour for the value update animation for increases in the rectangular bar's value

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the OZDWWidget wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • update

        public void update​(boolean updatingHp,
                   int newVal)
        Updates the OZDWWidget's current value with a new value. Also updates the appearance of the OZDWWidget accordingly.
        Parameters:
        updatingHp - True if the HP (rectangular) bar's values are being updated, false if the ability (circular) bar's values are being updated.
        newVal - New value to update the OZDWWidget with.

      • update

        public void update​(boolean updatingHp,
                   int newVal,
                   int newMax)
        Updates the OZDWWidget's current value and current maximum value with new values. Also updates the appearance of the OZDWWidget accordingly.
        Parameters:
        updatingHp - True if the HP (rectangular) bar's values are being updated, false if the ability (circular) bar's values are being updated.
        newVal - New value to update the OZDWWidget with.
        newMax - New maximum value to update the OZDWWidget with.

      • useAbility

        public void useAbility()
        Triggers the animation for resetting the ability charge bar. Essentially the ability is "used". Only works if the ability is fully charged and is not currently being used.

      • toggleSound

        public void toggleSound()
        Toggle between sound effects being disabled and enabled.
